title: Modern 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom Unit in Gated Building
posting_body: Light and bright one bedroom, one bath unit.
All wooden laminate floors throughout, wood tiles in bathroom.
Glass shower doors, granite counter-tops in kitchen and bathrooms.
All stainless steel appliances, gas stove range, 2 parking spaces in gated community garage.
UNIT FEATURES: cable ready, central air Conditioning & Heating, front load washer and Dryer in unit.
Just a short way from the 101 freeway, CSUN and Ventura Blvd businesses with public transit a block away, traveling to or from the property is extremely easy.
Gated access to building and security cameras.
Tenant is responsible for all utilities.
Fridge may be provided for an additional charge.
Minimum credit score is 650 and verifiable documented income is required.
No smoking and no pets please.
